The group pulled the door open, immediately illuminating the room. 
Instead=
 of finding a door to the outside, they found a command center.

"So we've =
been inside our comand center this whole time." said Perseus.

He looked ov=
er to the communications pannel, there was a message
flashing on the consol=
e.  A pod was emitting a signal.  He looked at
the other bots he had been t=
rapped with in that room.  It had only
been his crew.

"Any for what reason=
 did you decide not to talk to me?  Is this some
kind of joke?" asked Perse=
us.

"No, we didn't know where we were either..."

"You didn' t recognize m=
y voice?"

They now looked embarrassed.  Their names were Guardia, Ravenchi=
ef,
and Salveo.  Together with Perseus, they were the Pasificus Maximals. 
=
They lived on the island of Atlantis, and hoped to stay out of combat;
howe=
ver, they made sure to keep their fighting skills sharp so that
they would =
not be defenceless.  They vowed not to use force unless
they were defending=
 themselves or a defenceless person.

"I don't know what's going on, but Ra=
venchief and Guardia: you go and
find out where this pod is.  Salveo and I =
will try to find out why the
lights and doors are not functioning."

They n=
odded in approval and left to their assigned tasks.
